# ldesign-steps



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Steps 步骤条组件

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description | Type                                         | Default        |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `current`   | `current`   | 当前步骤        | `number`                                     | `0`            |
| `direction` | `direction` | 步骤条方向       | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                 | `'horizontal'` |
| `size`      | `size`      | 步骤条尺寸       | `"default" \| "small"`                       | `'default'`    |
| `status`    | `status`    | 当前步骤的状态     | `"error" \| "finish" \| "process" \| "wait"` | `'process'`    |
